statements: SELECT * FROM article_interactions WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, article_id, user_id FROM article_interactions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM article_interactions WHERE article_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM article_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM article_interactions GROUP BY article_id;
SELECT * FROM article_interactions WHERE article_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM article_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT article_id, MAX(interaction_date) FROM article_interactions GROUP BY article_id ORDER BY article_id ASC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM article_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT article_id, user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM article_interactions WHERE article_id IN (2, 5, 7) ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_name, email, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT user_name, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.user_name, i.interaction_type FROM users u INNER JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM Articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, content, category FROM Articles WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M';

SELECT Users.username, Articles.title FROM Users JOIN Interactions ON Users.user_id = Interactions.user_id JOIN Articles ON Interactions.article_id = Articles.article_id WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(article_id) AS total_interactions FROM Interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 2;

SELECT Users.username, Articles.title, Interactions.interaction_type FROM Users LEFT JOIN Interactions ON Users.user_id = Interactions.user_id LEFT JOIN Articles ON Interactions.article_id = Articles.article_id WHERE Users.age < 25 AND Interactions.interaction_type = 'Like';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT article_id, article_title, category FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, article_id, interaction_type FROM article_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_article_id FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, category FROM articles WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM article_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, recommended_article_id FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id < 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT title FROM articles WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND author_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, article_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='like' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, article_id, rating FROM ratings WHERE rating > 3.5 AND timestamp >= '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT article_id, title, author_id FROM articles WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, article_id, rating FROM ratings WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY user_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_article_id, score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' AND score > 0.5 ORDER BY score DESC, recommended_article_id ASC;
